name: PittsburghRecyling(Southdivision)
0:
”Alexa ask Pittsburgh Recycling South is today recycling day”
”Alexa ask Pittsburgh Recycling South is it recycling week”
”Alexa ask Pittsburgh Recycling South should I take out the recycling”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pittsburgh recycling south
des:
In Pittsburgh, you take out the recycling every other week. This skill tells you if it's recycling week.

Note that this skill reports the schedule for the South division only. Division maps can be found at http://pittsburghpa.gov/dpw/collection-schedules.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
